none: Time X - Love It Or Leave It demo
Love It Or Leave It demo
Time X - Love It Or Leave It demo

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 11, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
Screaming political straight edge (obviously) fastcore - this was the shit that turned me on my ear in the early '00s, and Portugal's TIME X were way ahead of the curve (and the pack) with this 2001 demo. Nine blasts of fierce and uncompromising hardcore played with maximum intensity. The excessive samples are also an indicator of the time, but here they make it clear where the band is coming from and provide welcome breathers instead of killing the flow. Listen early and listen often.  LOVE IT OR LEAVE IT
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-s7932WEuh-M/VaEiOhSkNGI/AAAAAAAAMt8/EmIKxSDtqnk/s1600/Time%2BX%2Bcover.jpg //1.bp.blogspot.com/-iCWjNLB_HeE/VaEjIWbETQI/AAAAAAAAMuE/4Fc-N6CvegU/s1600/Time%2BX%2Bimg.jpg
